body_html:
@zasdfgbnm We have already tried in the past to add some special-case handling in the indexing code #6770, but the TH/THC functions are less generic and don't handle all cases (like negative indices), so the patch was reverted.

I agree with @colesbury that we should preferably make the indexing code more efficient.
body_text:
@zasdfgbnm We have already tried in the past to add some special-case handling in the indexing code #6770, but the TH/THC functions are less generic and don't handle all cases (like negative indices), so the patch was reverted.
I agree with @colesbury that we should preferably make the indexing code more efficient.
body:
@zasdfgbnm We have already tried in the past to add some special-case handling in the indexing code https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/6770, but the TH/THC functions are less generic and don't handle all cases (like negative indices), so the patch was reverted.

I agree with @colesbury that we should preferably make the indexing code more efficient.
